__e: Well,it's just that in our church, People don't talk back to the minister.
If the minister's not here yet, we just have to get married without a minister.
Or the priest won't perform the proper rites.
- There's a priest you can talk to.
We don't need no preacher telling us what we can and cannot do.
The chaplain. He'll know more about it.
- You heard the priest. He won't.
But the reverend didn't cause anything that wasn't destined to break apart.
The priest said if you're not there... - Coming, coming.
Please... send him back because people realize now that he's not a priest like any other.
But if you're a minister, you'll go straight to heaven, won't you?
The priest is here. He wants to speak to you.
And what if I found the chaplain and said, "Sir, orders for a rush wedding"?
I am not a priest yet and probably shall never be one.
I had hoped Father Moore wouldn't need me but I don't wanna see him put away.

Because you will see that after the utter failure of doctors to help Emily Father Moore simply tried to help Emily in a different way using an approach that he, Emily and her family firmly believed was her only chance for relief.
And as she was when Father Richard Moore was finished with her and left her to die.
